summary: About Andy from Boy's Club - Andy is one of the main characters in the graphic novel 'Boy's Club' by Matt Furie. He is the roommate of Pepe, the famous meme frog. In the book, Andy is depicted as a laid-back and friendly character, often seen lounging around in his underwear and playing video games with his friends Pepe, Brett, and Landwolf. He has a love for pizza and junk food, which is often seen in the book as he and his friends indulge in their favorite snacks while watching TV or playing video games.
